reviewText: Excellent Horror Movie.  Really enjoyed watching it.  I could watch it over and over again.  Definitely recommend this movie to anyone.

I bought this and it came within a few days and the quality is great I love both of these movies and am very pleased to add them to my collection.

Danielle Wade

This movie, written and directed by Tom Holland, is a must see if you have not seen it yet or in a long while. Yes a little retro 80s but still funny and the second highest-grossing horror film of 1985. Sequel to this film bombed in 1988. Plot, teen boy lives with single mom.  New neighbor moves in and seems suspicious, moving only at night carrying around large full trash bags, not to mention some long sharp fingernails. Nobody listens to teen boy about his suspicions. Roddy McDowell (star of the original Planet of the Apes movies) plays Peter Vincent as an aging retired actor turned late night host for the TV show "Fright Night", that said teen watches, that airs old spook movies. The movies starred a younger Mr. Vincent as a Van Helsing type vampire slayer, and ya, you see where this is going. Surprisingly it has some scary moments and the Vampire JERRY (I know, right?) and minions are 'dead' serious in a mostly comedic film.

I picked it up again to review and share with my nieces before seeing the remake which stars vampire Colin Farrell & David Tennant ("Doctor Who") as Peter Vincent a Vegas magician. Haven't seen it yet but sounds like a great duo if they can hold the mix of creepy and humorous too.
The service I experienced with this seller was "second-to-none." I would not hesitate to do business with this seller again. First rate!!!
hubby watches  it quite a bit!
Two horror movies with bits of comedy thrown in. Fun friday night movie.
As a teenager I loved Fright Night--was glad to share it with my nephews.  Urban Legend was a bonus.
Fright Night is an awesome movie funny and cool.
Two really good movies for a good price.
We'll the movie works just fine, but the movie was dated which I kind of expected. This is why I rated it lower.
Great classic movies. My husband had been wanting these movies for a while to watch with our son.  Needless to say, they were a surprise and he loved it!!!
